org.cougaar.core.component
Class ComponentDescriptions

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.core.component.ComponentDescriptions
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class ComponentDescriptions
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

A utility class for manipulating sets of ComponentDescription objects.

Contains both ComponentDescriptions and StateTuples. StateTuples are simply ComponentDescription wrappers with an addition "Object state". These two concepts may be merged in the future...

See Also:

Method Detail

sort

public static java.util.List sort(java.util.List cds)
Sort a List of ComponentDescriptions by priority. Note that the original list is destructively modified, so an exception may be generated if the argument is not mutable.

Returns:
the (now sorted) original list object.

extractDirectComponents

public java.util.List extractDirectComponents(java.lang.String cp)
Return a list of the components which are direct subcomponents of the specified containment point. The ContainmentPoint parameter should not end with a '.'. Always returns a newly created list. The elements are always in priority-sorted order.

extractInsertionPointComponent

public java.util.List extractInsertionPointComponent(java.lang.String dip)
extract a list of ComponentDescriptions which have a specified insertion point Always returns a newly created list. The elements are always in priority-sorted order.

selectComponentDescriptions

public java.util.List selectComponentDescriptions(int priority)
return a iterator over of the list of the ComponentDescriptions with a specified priority.
